---

---



Looking at making **slopes** for the **#30DayCahrtChallenge 2023 - day 5**

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2023, week = 03)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Downloading file 1 of 1: `artists.csv`
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artists <- tuesdata$artists
artists%>%head
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 6 × 14
  artist_name   edition_number  year artist_nationality artist_nationality_other
  <chr>                  <dbl> <dbl> <chr>              <chr>                   
1 Aaron Douglas              9  1991 American           American                
2 Aaron Douglas             10  1996 American           American                
3 Aaron Douglas             11  2001 American           American                
4 Aaron Douglas             12  2005 American           American                
5 Aaron Douglas             13  2009 American           American                
6 Aaron Douglas             14  2013 American           American                
# ℹ 9 more variables: artist_gender <chr>, artist_race <chr>,
#   artist_ethnicity <chr>, book <chr>, space_ratio_per_page_total <dbl>,
#   artist_unique_id <dbl>, moma_count_to_year <dbl>,
#   whitney_count_to_year <dbl>, artist_race_nwi <chr>
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artists%>%DataExplorer::profile_missing()%>%arrange(-pct_missing)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 14 × 3
   feature                    num_missing pct_missing
   <fct>                            <int>       <dbl>
 1 artist_ethnicity                    58      0.0183
 2 artist_name                          0      0     
 3 edition_number                       0      0     
 4 year                                 0      0     
 5 artist_nationality                   0      0     
 6 artist_nationality_other             0      0     
 7 artist_gender                        0      0     
 8 artist_race                          0      0     
 9 book                                 0      0     
10 space_ratio_per_page_total           0      0     
11 artist_unique_id                     0      0     
12 moma_count_to_year                   0      0     
13 whitney_count_to_year                0      0     
14 artist_race_nwi                      0      0     
```
:::
:::




413 Artistis,


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(artists)+
  geom_point(aes(x = artist_unique_id,y=artist_nationality))+
  facet_wrap(~artist_race)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](w3_Arhd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(artists,aes(x = year, y = space_ratio_per_page_total, group = artist_unique_id)) +
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(~artist_gender)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](w3_Arhd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artists %>%
  filter(artist_gender=="Female") %>%
ggplot(aes(x = year, y = space_ratio_per_page_total, group = artist_unique_id)) +
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(~artist_nationality)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](w3_Arhd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artists %>%
  filter(artist_gender=="Female",
         artist_nationality=="French",
         artist_race=="White") %>%
ggplot(aes(x = year, y = space_ratio_per_page_total, group = artist_unique_id)) +
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(~book)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](w3_Arhd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



**Giorgio de Chirico** space_ratio_per_page_total along the time.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artists%>%
  filter(artist_name=="Giorgio de Chirico") %>%
  ggplot(
       aes(x = year, y = space_ratio_per_page_total, group = artist_unique_id)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](w3_Arhd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
  geom_abline(slope=-0.000050,intercept = mean(artists$space_ratio_per_page_total))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
mapping: intercept = ~intercept, slope = ~slope 
geom_abline: na.rm = FALSE
stat_identity: na.rm = FALSE
position_identity 
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(artists,
       aes(x = year, y = space_ratio_per_page_total, group = artist_unique_id)) +
  geom_line()+
  facet_wrap(vars(artist_nationality))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](w3_Arhd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artists%>%
  filter(artist_nationality=="Italian")%>%#count(year)
  mutate(year=as.integer(year)) %>%
ggplot(
       aes(x = year, y = space_ratio_per_page_total, 
           group = artist_name,
           fill=artist_name,
           color=artist_name,
           label=artist_name)) +
  geom_point(shape=21,
             stroke=0.5,
             alpha=0.5,
             show.legend = FALSE)+
  geomtextpath::geom_textsmooth(method = "lm",
                                se=FALSE,
                                family="Roboto Condensed",
                                show.legend = FALSE)+
  scale_color_viridis_d()+
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(1945,2035),n.breaks = 5,expand = c(0,0))+
  facet_wrap(~book,scales = "free") +
  labs(y="Space Ratio per Page Total",
       x="Year",
       title="Male Italian Artists",
       subtitle="how much space their work took up in each textbook",
       caption = "DataSource: #TidyTuesday 2023 week3 Art history\nDataViz: Federica Gazzelloni #30DayChartChallenge 2023 Day5 - slope\n")+
  hrbrthemes::theme_ipsum_rc(plot_title_size = 28,
                             caption_face = "bold",
                             caption_family = "Roboto Condensed",
                             base_family = "Roboto Condensed"
                              )+
    theme(strip.background = element_blank(),
          strip.placement = "outside",
          strip.clip = "off",
          strip.text = element_text(hjust=0.5,size=20),
          plot.margin = unit(c(5,10,5,5),units = "pt"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](w3_Arhd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("w3_Arhd.png",
       bg="white",
       width = 9,height = 5)
```
:::
